original_text: Everyone in Joseph's family also went with him. His brothers and their families went, but they did not take their young children or their animals. They left those in Goshen.
korean_text: 요셉의 온 집과 그의 형제들과 그의 아버지의 집이 그와 함께 올라가고 그들의 어린 아이들과 양 떼와 소 떼만 고센 땅에 남겼으며

sentences.original_text: Everyone in Joseph's family also went with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉의 가족 모두도 그와 함께 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: His brothers and their families went,
but they did not take their young children
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 어린 자녀들을 데려가지 않았습니다.
